DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish a new criteria with which to judge the quality of sperm samples submitted for artificial reproductive treatments. It is believed that this type of testing can compliment the traditional semen analysis to better drive patient care.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Sperm DNA Integrity on Artificial Reproductive Treatment (ART)
DOC.criteria: needs interventions through artificial reproductive treatment to achieve a pregnancy severly oligozoospermic patients
